column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ ase bio kyerɛkyerɛe wɔ mpoano. Na nyimpadodow pii behyiaa ne nkyɛn
column3: ma dɛm ntsi ɔkɔr hɛn mu kɛtsenaa ase wɔ po enyi
column4: nna nyimpadodow no nyina wɔ mpoano wɔ daadze."

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn ndzɛmba pii wɔ abɛbu mu
column3: na ɔsee hɔn wɔ ne nkyerɛkyerɛ mu dɛ
ɔbaa dɛ bi koguu kwan nkyɛn na nnoma bae bɔsosɔwee."

column2: "Na bi koguu abosamdo mbrɛ oennya dɛtse pii; na ntsɛmara na ofirii
column3: osiandɛ oennya dɛtse a no mu dɔ;"
ɔhyewee
column4: na osiandɛ onnyi ndwow ntsi ɔkyenkyenee."

column3: na nsoɛ no nyinii

column2: "Na bi so koguu asaase pa mu
column3: na ɔsoow aba a onyinii na ɔdɔɔ so; na ɔsoow bi eduasa
Nyia ɔwɔ aso a wɔdze tsie no
hɔn a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no wɔnye duebien no bisaa no mbɛ no ase."
Hom na wɔdze Nyankopɔn ahenman no mu esumasɛm ama hom; na hɔn a wɔwɔ ekyir no dze
column4: wɔkyerɛ hɔn ne nyina mbɛbu mu
column10: amma wɔaannsakyer na wɔaammfa hɔn bɔn annkyɛ hɔn."

column3: Hom nnyim bɛ yi? Na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na hom ehu mbɛ nyina ase?"

column2: "Na iyinom nye hɔn a wɔwɔ kwan nkyɛn no
column3: wɔ mbrɛ wogu asɛm no; na wɔatse no
column4: Satan ba ntsɛmara beyi asɛm no a wogui wɔ hɔn mu no."

column2: "Na iyinom so nye hɔn a wogu hɔn abosam do no; hɔn a wɔtse asɛm no a
column3: ntsɛmara wɔdze dɛw gye;"
na wɔwɔ hɔ ber tsiaa bi ntsi
column4: sɛ abɛbrɛsɛ anaa ahohia soɛr wɔ asɛm no ntsi a

column2: "Iyinom nye hɔn a wogu hɔn nsoɛ mu no
column3: hɔn a wɔatse asɛm no
column5: "na wiadze yi mu akɔdadwen nye ahonya ndaadaa nye ndzɛmba nkaa no ho akɔndɔ kɔ hɔn mu

column2: "Na iyinom nye hɔn a wogu hɔn asaase pa mu no
column3: hɔn a wɔtse asɛm no na wɔgye na wɔsow aba
Ana wɔdze kandzea ba dɛ wɔdze besi kuruw ase anaa mpa ase? Nnyɛ dɛ wɔdze besi kandzeadua do bi?"
na woennhuntsa biribi gyedɛ ɔrebɛda gua."

column2: "Sɛ obi wɔ aso a wɔdze tsie a
column3: ma ontsie."
Hom nhwɛ dza hom tse no yie: esusudze kor a hom dze susu no
column5: na wɔdze bi bɛka hom ho."

column3: wɔbɛma no
column5: dza ɔwɔ no mpo wɔbɛgye ne nsamu."

column3: Mbrɛ Nyankopɔn n’ahenman tse nye yi
column4: dɛ nyimpa bogu aba wɔ famu;"

column2: "na ɔbɛda na obenyan adzesaa nye adzekyee
column3: na aba no befifir na oenyin
ahaban no dzi kan
column5: na nkyii ɔayɛ eburow wɔ bɛtsem no mu."

column3: ntsɛmara na ɔdze kantankrankye ato mu
Ebɛnadze na yɛdze bɔto Nyankopɔn ahenman ho? Anaadɛ ebɛn bɛ na yɛdze bɛkyerɛ?"

column2: "Ɔtse dɛ sinape abafua a wodua no famu a osuar kyɛn aba a ɔwɔ asaase do nyina;"

column3: onyin yɛ kɛse kyɛn nhaban nyina
column5: ma wimu nnoma tum yɛ hɔn mberɛbuw wɔ no nwin mu."

column2: "Na mbɛ a ɔtsetse dɛm yi pii na ɔdze kaa asɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wobotum etsie."

column2: "Na ɔannkasa annkyerɛ hɔn a ɔannka no abɛbu mu
column3: na ɔka hɔn nko a
column4: ɔkyerɛ n’esuafo no ndzɛmba nyina ase."

column3: odur ewimbir no
column5: Hom mma yentwa nkɔ esuegya noho."

column3: wɔkɔr hɛmba a Jesus wɔ mu no mu. Nna ahɛn nkakraba bi so ka ho."
na asorɛkye bui bɔhwee hɛn no mu
ɔwɔ hɛntu ada wɔ sundze do; na wonyaan no na wɔsee no dɛ
ɔbraa mframa no
column5: Taa dzinn! Na mframa no dwee

column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom yɛ ehufo dɛm yi? Ana hom da ho nnyi gyedzi?"
na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ
column4: Woana nye yi a mframa na po mpo wotsie n’asɛm yi?"
